title: Pax Sivir Skin
body: Ok so I went to PaxAus and I received the neo pax sivir skin, and so did a friend of mine that was visiting from America. When he got back home he had an error with putting in the code. Any help as to why this is happening please help me out thank you.

replies.body:
Skin codes are region specific, if he tried activating it on NA it won't work. 

You can get him to send a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) explaining the situation in along with evidence (like a picture) that he has the code, and ask very nicely that they manually apply it to his account. No promisies this will work though.
